cu.explanation_en: Setting drb_ciphering to an invalid enum value 'maybe' will cause security configuration parsing errors and prevent proper ciphering setup in the CU.

du.explanation_en: Setting maxMIMO_layers to 0, which is below the valid minimum, will cause MIMO configuration errors and prevent proper layer allocation in the DU.
du.explanation_zh: 將 maxMIMO_layers 設定為 0（低於有效最小值）會導致 MIMO 配置錯誤，並阻止 DU 中正確的層分配。
